betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Blank Seal serves as the core for controlling golems, and any golem meeting the requirements of the sigil can be commanded to perform specific tasks. Here's a breakdown of different types of sigils:

Gather Seal: This sigil directs golems to pick up items that fall within its range. Players can specify which items the golem should pick up.

Storage Seal: This sigil commands golems to transport items to the location of the sigil. If placed on an item container, the golem will place the items inside; otherwise, it will drop them on the ground.

Empty Seal: This sigil, when attached to a container, causes golems in its range to remove items from the container.

Guard Seal: When an enemy is within the range of this sigil, it requests nearby combat-capable golems to attack and eliminate the enemy. If the golem has the "Dexterous" trait, it will drop experience orbs upon killing the enemy.

Mining Seal: This sigil calls upon golems with the "Destroy" trait to mine blocks within its range.

Supply Seal: Similar to the Empty Sigil, but it will only provide items when nearby other sigils are requesting them.

Storage Seal: This sigil ensures that a container holds a minimum number of items, preventing it from running out of essential materials.
